name: Spectral (itch) (Rocketcat241)
description:
Spectral is a procedural rhythm game that can take in any kind of music.

This is mostly just an experiment of mine and doesn't always work too well, so keep that in mind.

Controls are: (Space) hit note, (Escape) Leave Game

To upload a custom url make sure that the url leads directly to the download for an mp3 file.

All songs in this game are made by me with the exception of Fur Elise. These are mostly songs for games that I've scrapped.
